Hi! I'm a software developer, civic technologist, and educator currently living in Chicago.

I'm currently an Assistant Clinical Professor at the University of Chicago. I teach in the [Computational Analysis and Public Policy](https://capp.uchicago.edu/) and [Masters Program in Computer Science](https://masters.cs.uchicago.edu/).

I'm trying to write more, you can read [my latest posts here](/) or follow via [RSS](http://localhost:4444/index.xml).

### Jobs

Prior to this I was:

* Director of Public Data at [Civic Eagle (now Plural)](https://www.pluralpolicy.com/).
* Founder/CTO, State Automata
* Principal Engineer, [Princeton Gerrymandering Project](https://gerrymander.princeton.edu/)
* Director of Technology, [Public Broadcasting Service](https://pbs.org)
* Over a period of eight years at the [Sunlight Foundation](https://sunlightfoundation.com), I was a Software Developer, Open Source Coordinator, OpenStates.org and Municipal Data Team Lead, and the Director of Sunlight Labs.

I've also done freelance work for organizations like:

* The Orlando Sentinel - Tabs on Tallahassee
* City Bureau - [City Scrapers](https://cityscrapers.org/)
* Various Political Campaigns

### Open States

I helped found [Open States](https://openstates.org), and served as its lead developer from 2009-2014 and 2016-2022.

* 2009-2014: Project Lead while at Sunlight
* 2016-2019: Led Open States as independent organization
* 2019-2022: Led Open States while at Civic Eagle
